alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding potential caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Oklahoma, including the following counties, Jackson and Tillman. * WHEN...Until 900 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 804 PM CDT, rain has ended over the advisory area, but flooding may still be occurring in low-lying and flood prone areas from the heavy rain that fell earlier today. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Altus, Blair, Martha, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Humphreys and Warren. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
